thread.title: Burger King giving away sex toys with X-rated Valentine's Day Whoppers

title: Burger King giving away sex toys with X-rated Valentine's Day Whoppers
text:
Burger King giving away sex toys with X-rated Valentine's Day Whoppers Burger King giving away sex toys with X-rated Valentine's Day Whoppers BURGER King has come up with the ingenious idea to hand out sex toys with a selection of strictly adult meals. / Published 14th February 2017 
Don’t worry about suffering the shame of a burger and fries for one this Valentine’s Day – because now there’s an 18+ reason to enjoy being single and getting food in a cardboard box. 
Because Burger King has created an adult-only meal and you certainly won’t be wanting to share. 
There’s only one tiny catch – they are only available in Israel. 
But with the reception the giveaway is receiving online, it’s surely only a matter of time before the saucy boxes are rolled out worldwide. 
YOUTUBE/BURGERKING ADULT: The meals are available for one day only 
According to a clip promoting the sales tactic, the cheeky toys on offer include a feather tickle stick, an eye mask and a head massager. 
Thousands of viewers have been commenting on the advert, with one saying: “So many questions! Is this real? Will the feathers get in my fries? What in the world is going on?!” 
“So proud to be an Israeli right now, one of our best contributions to mankind,” another viewer commented. 
A third said: “Am I gonna be getting dildos with my whopper meal?” 
Unfortunately, it appears the choice of toys may have given one viewer a complex, who said: “Erm, the third item is a head massager…my mum bought me one of those. Do I need to see someone?” 
YOUTUBE/BURGERKING CHEEKY: Food fans can get their hands on a sexy toy with their meal 10 of the Most Popular Sexual Fetishes Monday, 23rd January 2017 The definition of a sexual fetish is the need for an object, body part or material to achieve an elevated state of sexual arousal. Take a look at the top 10 here! 1 / 10 Getty Images/Vetta Spanking - Why do people like being spanked? It has more to do with just the feeling of pain one feels. The area of the buttocks that meets the back of the thigh is considered an erogenous zone and if contact is made with the right amount of pressure and 
The advert tells BK fans: “Kids meal? That’s for kids. 
“Burger King presents the adult's meal, with an adult toy inside. Only on Valentine’s Day and only from 6pm.” 
You also apparently get two whopper burgers, two servings of french fries and two beers in the box – because nothing gets you in the mood like a beer and burger bloat. 
Now viewers are calling for “Burger Kink” to be rolled out worldwide. 
There is no doubt Brits would be happy to splash the cash on an adult meal, with couples expected to fork out an estimated £6billion on dinners, flowers and sex toys today. Related articles
